name: aqueduct
description: Aqueduct: API and Socket client for ERC dEXCHANGE
author: ERC dEx

scripts.build:lib: rimraf dist && npm run generate:client && npm run build
scripts.build:lib:fresh: npm run fetch:swagger && npm run build:lib
scripts.start:docs: npm run generate:docs && cd docs && npm start
scripts.build:docs: npm run generate:docs && cd docs && npm run build:prod
scripts.generate:docs: npm run build:lib && rimraf ./docs/src/frames/typedoc && typedoc --excludeExternals --excludePrivate --theme themes/custom --readme none --name "Aqueduct JavaScript Client" --mode modules --out ./docs/src/frames/typedoc ./src/generated/aqueduct.ts
